Uses of Class
org.ensembl.registry.Registry

Packages that use Registry
org.ensembl.registry The Registry makes it easy to access to multiple ensembl databases.

Methods in org.ensembl.registry that return Registry
static Registry Registry.createDefaultRegistry()
          Create a registry pointing at the latest databases on ensembldb.ensembl.org.
static Registry Registry.createDefaultUserRegistry()
          Create a registry from the default user registry file returned by getDefaultUserRegistryFile().
